title: Two Questions About How to play Ezreal

replies.body:
Check out this site: http://www.probuilds.net/champions/details/Ezreal

You can get a good sense of the exact build path, runes and masteries that the pro players have theory crafted. It also confirms that blue build ezreal is not dead. I don't know the exact details of when you would choose one over the other but I'm sure you can figure that out after browsing the matches for a bit.

Bluebuild should be dead now that Iceborn has been nerfed to only be useful to Tanks/Brawlers.
Ezreal's damage suffers a lot if he takes Iceborn over Triforce too.

My typical build goes {{item:3042}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3009}} 
And the last item is situational depending on the needs. I rather like {{item:3033}} usually, but find that depending on enemy comp a {{item:3139}} might be needed more.

Masteries I got for Thunderlords with the 45% CDR.
Runes I play around with a fair bit depending on my mood.
this is an interesting build path... as for any other champ just watch what koreans build (almost always blue with fervor)

They are the same, just different sheen item. Triforce build is if your team is early game and you plan to end as early as possible, or just to snowball hard, which blue build is aimed at late game with constant damage and kiting power
